A phenomenal mind-bending puzzle title, an absolute classic and probably the last great game developed by the guys from Valve.
Es realmente divertido para jugarlo con amigos, 100% recomendable para disfrutar en compañía.

I hate using my brain, i hate trying to figure out puzzles, but this is my most favorite game of all time. The story is so good and it makes you want more, You need this game. 10/10

The main thing that makes me absolutely love this game is its environments. All the levels have had such work put into them. The fact that the level itself is just a linear path isn't that amazing, but the fact that it looks infinite. There's so many things in the background. It makes Aperture Science feel like an actual place, not just a bunch of corridors connected togheter. Everything feels so unknown, considering theres so many places that look like you can explore them. Also the industrial feel is so nice, and the plotline is amazing. To me, Portal 2 is one of the best games ever made, it's a masterpiece, and every time I play it, I get such warm feelings. Valve, Portal 3 please. (Note: Got this game back in like 2018 in a bundle that also had Portal for about 2 dollars)

포탈 2는 주인공 첼이 아직 연구소에서 탈출을 못하게 되고 전작에서 파괴된 글라도스가 예기치 못하게 다시 깨어나게 되면서 다시 첼이 글라도스의 실험을 하게되는 게임이다.  
전작에 비해 그래픽도 진보하였으며 밸브의 스토리 명작겜인 만큼 분위기, 연출, 세계관 모든것이 이 게임에 빠져들게 하며 어느 요소 하나 뭐라할 수 없을만큼 명작이다. 
그리고 코옵이 생겼는데, 사람대신 실험체로 사용할려고 만든 로봇 아틀라스와 P-보디로 플레이할 수 있다 퍼즐을 풀어야하는 게임 특성상 협동플레이로 하면 색다른 재미를 또 느낄 수 있다.  [strike]아싸는? 안습[/strike] 그래도 스토리 게임 자체도 재미있으니 추천한다. 
[strike]감자(?)도스[/strike]를 만날 수 있을 것이다.
Nagyon jó gondolkotató logikai játék egy jó történet és akciódus játékmenet keretében. A játék teljes élvezetéhez és a történet pontos megértéséhez ajánlatos a Portal elsőrészével is játszani.

Portal 2 Güzel bir oyundur.Fiyatının hakının veriyor.Oyun hem tek oyunculu hem de çok oyunculu modda oynanmaktadır.Oyun daki amaç farklı portallar açıp görevleri tamamlamak veya kapılardan geçip o bölümü  geçmektir.Farklı renkte portallar diğer bir portalın içinden geçildiğinde diğerinden diğerinden geçildiğindende diğerinden çıkmaktadır.İlk bölümler kolay fakat daha sonraki leveller bir hayli zordur.Arkadaşınız ile oynanabilecek oyundur tavsiye ediyorum.

Amazing game! Loved it even though i don't usually pick up puzzle games! I have acheivement hunted down every single player acheivement with no guides in about 33 hours of playtime. Hilarious voice lines, great action, and very few dull moments! Great job, devs! Would highly reccomend.

Cons:

Conclusion:
Defnitely worth playing through at least once.  A great game.

Best game I ever played! It even has a level editor! Yes very limited but just get the Bee2.4 mod. I love this game, I got it on sale for $2 and man, I wish there was some DLC with it  because I just want more. Where is Portal 2 episode 1 and 2 where you go through the history of Aperture! Anyway, get the game. Get it now! It has something for everyone! Great puzzles, amazing humor, amazing characters, amazing graphics, over 8 hours long, and has unlimited replay value due to the steam workshop and being able to get Portal 2 fan games! I say get it! Get it now! NOW!

Portal 2 manages to add to the Portal formula and continues Portal 2's story, which is filled with interesting and funny dialogue by GLaDOS and the new character, Wheatley. It manages to add to the formula through the new concept of paint which can either make you faster, jump higher, or gives you the ability to create portals where you previously couldn't.
The lore is also expanded upon and made very interesting.
The addition of a Coop Campaign and a level-editor is amazing, because it gives the game loads of replayability. The puzzles in multiplayer are of course tailored for two pairs of portals, which leads to very interesting Puzzles

Игра, в которую нужно поиграть не только из-за крутой графики, различных испытаний и тестов, которые заставят вас попотеть, а именно, по моему мнению, из-за крутого сюжета, особенно из-за самой лучшей и красивой концовки, которую я видел. Поэтому советую всем поиграть в неё, если у вас, конечно-же, есть бабло на эту игру.

"Siempre supe de la existencia del juego pero nunca  me llamó la atención y no fue hasta que jugué con un amigo cuando todo cambió"

Aunque este análisis lo haga en el PORTAL 2 va dirigido tambien para la primera entrega, ya que entre los dos juegos hay una conexión muy buena y jugagando al segundo te entra la nostalgia al ver los escenarios que ya pasastes jugando a la primera parte. Un punto muy postivo por mi parte ver como se mezclan los dos portal.

Gráficamente se ve un notable cambio en esta segunda entrega... Aunque si que es verdad que hay una gran diferencia en la duración del juego, haciendo que el segundo sea demasiado largo para mi gusto llegando a tener pruebas un poco repetitivas sobre todo a la mitad del juego que bajo mi punto de vista se vuelven más difíciles y menos intuitivas.

Un punto a favor es que estén las voces en español por lo cual la jugabilidad aumenta evitando tener que leer subtítulos para poder enterarte bien de la historia, ya que los comentarios de los robots son lo que le da más vida y diversión a este.

Por último mencionas que bajo mi opinión esperaba algo más del final del juego pero por lo demas perfecto para mi gusto.
Fantastic. Buy it.

Oli Welsh: "Portal is perfect. Portal 2 is not. It's something better than that. It's human: hot-blooded, silly, poignant, irreverent, base, ingenious and loving. It's never less than a pure video game, but it's often more, and it will no doubt stand as one of the best entertainments in any medium at the end of this year(2011). It's a masterpiece. "

Portal 2 nos lleva de regreso a los laboratorios de Aperture pero esta vez mucho más gastados por el tiempo, incluso conoceremos las antiguas instalaciones, ahora sus puntos.

-Historia magnifica 
-Mecanicas mejoradas del anterior portal y muchas nuevas
-Personajes carismaticos
-Un boss final y ending que te haran emocionar
-Modo cooperativo en linea o pantalla partida (algo dificil de ver en estos días)
-Tiene a la mejor tsundere de los videojuegos: GLaDOS :v

En pocas palabras si te gusto el primer Portal estas obligado a comprar este, ahora de mis juegos favoritos.

9/10

Portal 2 is amazing. The graphics are good, the characters have depth and character, and the story is interesting. My only compalint is that its very similiar to the first game. The first game goes like this; you wake up in a room and are greeted by a voice (GLados). This voice you learn is your friend and you go off and do some testing. Then at the end of the game you learn that this "friend" wanted you dead the whole time. Finally you defeat said friend and then you escape. The second game goes just like this time there is a person (GLados) who is the enemy and you have the friend (Wheatley). Another difference is that instead of wanting you dead the whole time, the friend went power crazy. And when you escape you actually escape. Overall though this game is pretty good. 7/10 would recommend.
Masterpiece.
